name: Gumroad
title: gumroad.com
shortDescription: Gumroad simplifies online selling for creators, enabling them to monetize their skills and products. Ideal for artists, writers, and designers, it offers tools to sell various digital goods like ebooks, courses, and art. Users can start with simple products and expand to subscriptions or complex offerings, leveraging Gumroad's easy setup and integration capabilities.
pros: Easy to set up and use
Supports a variety of digital products
cons: Higher fees compared to some competitors

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Sellfy
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Strong in digital and physical goods sales
